Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Educational | Family
Status: Returning Series
Network: CBC ( Canada)
Airs: Mondays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January 21, 2008
Episode Order: 8

The premise is simple. Take one small Canadian town, remove the women, and see if the men can keep the home fires burning - without burning the kids' dinner. This season, the women of Tatamagouche, Nova Scotia - a picturesque Maritime village with a population of approximately 700 - disappear for one week, leaving the men to fend for themselves and their families.
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-20879)
